title: New Skins MIA??
body: So I'll be honest since last patch ive been counting the days down till dawnbringer and nightbringer skins will be put out. Maybe a bit psychotic but I even pulled an all nighter waiting for the patch to come out...and yet there is still no release or even info on when they will come out. Any and all help is appreciated as to when they will be coming out :)

replies.body: Hang tight, and get some rest!  You don't want to be exhausted when it happens!  The patch notes state that they are aimed to release this patch, but it doesn't mean on the same.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date!  :D
